title: "A platform that can read and write"
excerpt: "Cohere’s platform is powered by models that have “read” billions of pages of text and “learned” to understand language on a deep level. The company’s innovation was to use this expensive supercomputing infrastructure to create a platform that allows developers to complete language-intensive tasks with just a few lines of code."
